attributes.action: Reduce the High  Cost of Limited Leave to Remain  Visa & Scrap the N.H Surcharge
attributes.additional_details: High  Cost of Limited Leave to Remain  Visa Application  & the National Health Surcharge puts Non-EU immigrant in debt especially when a family of more than two is applying for visa extension. NH Surcharge I believe is double-charging immigrant hence they are working and paying their portion of NI . Most of these Non-EU Immigrant go into borrowing to afford the money their application, and most go into working too many hours just to afford the money, thereby putting their health at risk.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the current cost of certain immigration fees, but we're not sure exactly what fees you'd like the Government or Parliament to change. There isn't a specific "Limited Leave to Remain Visa", so it's not clear if you want fees for all immigration routes that do not grant permanent rights to reside to be reduced, or just specific immigration fees.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
